documentation.text:
@notice Constructor, set startBlock at least 2 - 3 hours before actual launch time.
 @dev Please add funds before startBlock is reached.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Unable to transfer to fee Address"

arguments.value: Unable to transfer to fee Address

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Unable to transfer to fee Address"

documentation.text: @notice Allows users to withdraw their funds without any rewards

constructor.details: Please add funds before startBlock is reached.
constructor.notice: Constructor, set startBlock at least 2 - 3 hours before actual launch time.

deposit(uint256).details: updates the pool reward to give through time.
deposit(uint256).notice: withdraw stake tokens from pool back to user.

params._amount: the amount to deposit... Amount must be lower than limit

emergencyWithdraw().notice: Allows users to withdraw their funds without any rewards

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pendingReward(address).notice: give pending reward back from having the user account

returns._reward: The reward amount for the timeframe

recoverWrongTokens(address,uint256).details: This function is only callable by admin.
recoverWrongTokens(address,uint256).notice: It allows the admin to recover wrong tokens sent to the contract

params._tokenAddress: : the address of the token to withdraw
params._tokenAmount: : the number of tokens to withdraw

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

updatePoolLimitPerUser(uint256).details: Only callable by owner.if _newLimit is 0 then limit is removed

params._newLimit: : enforce limit only by number... new Limit must be higher or ZERO

withdraw(uint256).details: updates the pool reward to give through time.
withdraw(uint256).notice: withdraw stake tokens from pool back to user.

params._amount: the amount to withdraw... Amount must be the staked amount MAX
